resources.string: This service blocks known phishing URLs to protect users.

5. User Obligations

When using SmishX, you are enabling the application to access the SMS in your device to monitor the possible attacks of smishing. You must not use SmishX for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not interfere with or disrupt the operation of SmishX.

4. License

Strawhats grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use SmishX solely for your personal, non-commercial use. You agree not to reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of SmishX without our prior written consent.

3. Access to SMS

SmishX requires access to your SMS messages to provide its core functionality. By using SmishX, you consent to the application accessing, reading, and analyzing your SMS messages for the purpose of detecting and preventing phishing attempts.

2. Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using SmishX, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the application.

Effective Date: June 23, 2024

Welcome to SmishX, an application developed by Strawhats. By downloading, installing, and using SmishX, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

Welcome to smishx, a comprehensive phishing detection application utilizing machine learning algorithms. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application, smishx.

1.1 Personal Information
We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register an account, use our services, or interact with our application. This information may include:

Name
Email address
User-generated content (e.g., links submitted for analysis)

1.2 Non-Personal Information
We may collect non-personal information about your use of the application. This information may include:

Device information (e.g., device type, operating system, and browser type)
Usage data (e.g., pages visited, time spent on the application, and interaction data)
Log data (e.g., IP address, access times, and error logs)

2.1 Personal Information
We may use your personal information to:

Provide, operate, and maintain our application
Improve, personalize, and expand our application
Communicate with you, including sending updates, notifications, and support messages
Analyze user behavior and trends to enhance your experience

2.2 Non-Personal Information
We may use non-personal information to:

Monitor and analyze usage patterns and trends
Improve the functionality and performance of our application
Ensure the security and integrity of our application

3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our application, conducting our business, or providing services to you, provided they agree to keep your information confidential.
Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law, regulation, or legal process, or in response to a government request.
Protection of Rights: We may disclose your information to enforce our terms of service, protect the rights, property, or safety of our users or others, or investigate fraud or security issues.

4. Data Security\nWe implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
5.1 Access and Update\nYou have the right to access, update, and correct your personal information. You can do this by logging into your account and accessing the account settings.
5.2 Opt-Out\nYou may opt-out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in those communications or by contacting us directly.

5.3 Data Retention\nWe will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

6. Childrens Privacy\nOur application is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will delete such information promptly.

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy\nWe may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

8. Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Email: strawhats.thesis@gmail.com
By using smishx, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms, please do not use our application.
